name: When Light Go Off!
description:
Controls
  • Jump - Space
  • Kick - Left click
  • E - Torch
  • Mouse - Move torch
  • A&D - Left and right

You can only attack and kill moving enemies.
Kick on Switch to turn on the light in the end.
Each Jump on Trampoline increases the height of your jump.

A world which looks like it's full of monsters,traps. However is it the truth? Use the flash light to shine light on the lies and see the reality. However, you may need to accept darkness and lies and fight your way through it because there is a limit to your torch!

The only way to completely get rid of all the lies in this world you need to turn on the light. Which is located somewhere in map. Keep following the platforms and you will reach there eventually

Turn on the light and find ultimate truth!. (Trust me it's worth completing the game, so stick with it)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was such an awesome experience for us. We, team of three people did everything. From programming to music, from art and animation to design. And boy it was fun!

We really hope you enjoy this game and please provide feedback on overall game experience!

We are learning and trying to improve and these game jams are such an amazing platform to test ourselves. It is also our first ever game jam!

At last i just want to thank you, thank you all organisers and everyone in the community for being part of such an amazing event. And for being such a bad (lie) community!

Created By TinyBurb (Abhishek Rana, Lino Sero, Abhijeet Kumar)
